Description: Limestone statue of a squatting baboon (companion piece to 1233(, originally painted, wearing a naoform pectoral, with socket in the top of the head for the attachment of a headdress.
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2000 14 May-29 Oct, Germany, Berlin, Martin-Gropius-Bau, Seven Hills – Images and Signs of the 21st Century
Acquisition name: Purchased through: R J Moss & Co
